data.text:
@chrislhayes I don’t like wearing masks, but in fine, maybe because I’m Asian and it’s not a big deal. Probably a 6 for me. 

Though the worst is when you fall asleep on a plane and drool inside the mask and you have to smell your stinky breath for the rest of the flight.

I was in the bathroom when JetBlue flight#57 took off on 8/28 EWR - LAS. Flight attendant (Mike) knew I was in there and then in a pathetic attempt to cover up, he had me escorted off the plane bc I forgot to pull my mask up after eating. My back is severely! #JetBlue #witnesses
RT @Qblurts: Home my plane doesn't lose cabin pressure. Stewardess says I have to swap cloth mask for oxygen. Might catch rona.
@JustinTrudeau one of “those people” on a plane with no mask. Shame

@chrislhayes When a person’s choice impacts others, it is not an “individual choice”. Like drunk driving or smoking on a plane. Not wearing a mask impacts others, therefore not “individual choice”!

Masks should be mandated in certain situations.

@lucrezianews Jet2 plane landing in Madeira announced 'please remain seated and wear a mask permanently until leaving airport '. Big Bird stands up, swans off to the front and no mask. I wanted to punch her, just for ignoring instructions 😒🙄

I currently look like a jackass in the car with a mask on. Thanks to @Uber 
Bunch of Satanic worshippers. I can't breathe in this shit. As if the 3 hours on the plane wasn't enough.

On a plane. Flight attendant paused at my 5 year old (who had pulled his mask down) and then waved his hand in a kind way and moved on. I said to my husband that moment gave me hope. Shout out to the flight attendants who are not tyrants. We see you. #greatawakening
Home my plane doesn't lose cabin pressure. Stewardess says I have to swap cloth mask for oxygen. Might catch rona.

@libertylovingam @Delta I used to fly 150K per year on @AmericanAir.  Haven't stepped foot on a plane since Feb '20, and I won't again until the mask mandates and other covid control safety theater bullshit is gone.

she flew wearing, an itsy, bitsy light green bikini  because she just left a pool party and had another one to go to after she de-planed  - from the pool to the plane, from plane to the pool😂

https://t.co/OOZJ0V39gH

Mask mandates = Dictator, Abortion = Murder, Educators should teach Math not CRT, No one has been stopped from voting. You need to have an ID to vote, Just like getting on a plane. Anything else I can educate you on? https://t.co/TI7PsTOWGZ
@JoeManchinWV is the kind of guy who, when the plane starts to go down, puts on his own mask, then turns to the child next to him and says, "I want to put a pause on getting your mask on you."

So my airline travel has ended. Trip from Houston to Ft Lauderdale and back. I have to wonder why are still being forced to wear masks in airports and on planes? Buy a mask and read what it says on the package. It isn't intended to or won't stop a virus. Pack the plane sardines,
@DonnGunvalson Uh thought she was diagnosed with COVID.  Why is she on that plane with her mask not covering her nose? WTH 🤦🏾‍♀️
RT @DFWAirport: Also, please wear a mask at the airport and on the plane. 😷 You can take it off as soon as you step out into your destinati…

Also, if you can avoid it, don't take your mask off on a plane even to eat or drink. That's the one time I was not with other people I knew over the last 2 weeks, and everyone who I knew that I came into contact with are all COVID-free

@HappyTh03093382 @KHONnews You don’t have to be vaccinated to board a plane, just to enter Hawaii. Most states don’t enforce having to be vaccinated to travel. You just have to wear a mask on the plane.

They stopped the plane for his dumbass to read the brochure about him wearing the mask 😷
Guy on a @Delta plane is refusing to wear his mask properly. What an entire white piece of shit

@t1nyb0dy @Adom_MJr @MinaDoesnt @aldkwkxl @datdamncort @I_BeQueQue @p_o_e_gb @_GordonGartrell Can’t take my mask off on a plane or airport, but once I’m in my hotel sure thing. Just aslong as you post a pic in real time of your actual face 😂
@BuzzPatterson @HillaryClinton @BreitbartNews Killary left the earth plane a long time ago. This is an actor with a mask.

@SaturdayOnCouch @MarkLazerus That’s the part I totally hate, therefore I stay home- as for traveling overseas, I’m FULLY VACCINATED BUT there’s no damm way I’d get on a plane for 4-5 hours overseas with a mask on, I have a hard time when I do go out for 2 hours into a store….
Dude on plane wearing his mask halfway down. I want to ask him to cover up, but then, what if he flips out on me?
RT @mask_up_sweden: In Arlanda around 5-10% wore any kind of mask, the rest nothing until boarding the plane.
In Arlanda around 5-10% wore any kind of mask, the rest nothing until boarding the plane.
@Ryanair But on the plane for the journey? mask  or no mask? vaxxed or no vaxxed?

Ok people. Real talk. You know how to wear a mask that covers your nose and mouth. You all have these masks. When you get on a plane, quit pretending like you don’t breathe through your nose and wear a mask for real.

@Virtutis17 At theatre last year it was great. Drinks brought to you and you had to replace mask after every sip. This was heavily reinforced. So felt safe.  On plane the other day lots wearing masks round necks or only covering mouths. I ended up rowing with three women behind me. Ignorant!

@MaryMcC20329791 @RealSueKelly @nadeemahmed7736 @Dorotheacalm The German airline, Lufthansa, insists on surgical or FFP2 masks or better. This is strictly enforced. You cannot board a plane wearing just a face covering and you cannot speak to staff if your mask is not on.
